name: Virus Riot
description:
This is a Ludum Dare 38 entry.
#LDJAM #LD38
Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$19663

This is my ninth time to attend Ludum Dare.
Hope that everyone will enjoy my game :)

This is an action game (for 2 players).

You and your friend play as a virus or a leukocyte. (one for each)
Virus wants to take over the world of the human body and it's been spotted by the leukocyte.
Leukocyte tries its best to protect the human body from infection.

Game Goal:
  • Virus
    • Infect cells as much as you can by running over them.
    • If infected cells are over or equal to 50% of all cells, you win the invasion.
  • Leukocyte
    • Disinfect infected cells as much as you can by running over them.
    • If infected cells are lower than 50% of all cells, you protects the human body successfully.
Control:
  • Virus
    • Use "Z" to rotate counterclockwise.
    • Use "X" to rotate clockwise.
  • Leukocyte
    • Use "O" to rotate counterclockwise.
    • Use "P" to rotate clockwise.

Infect/Disinfect cells by running over them.
